biography.title: 你好 nǐ hǎo ！
biography.experience: I’m Aurélien all over the world or 立安 lì ān in China. Currently Product designer at iObeya for 5 years and an UI + enthousiast.
biography.mission: Filling the gap between designers and developpers universes is my leitmotiv, by learning code and teaching design.
biography.activities: I also write about team collaboration, design thinking and design system, animate meetup, participate in a french design system community.
biography.side: Otherwise, I customize furnitures and explore procedural animation.
